website_summaries.verdict: Carry one of these anywhere for a quick boost — just add to water. Low calorie count, too.
pros: Unique among energy boosters — just dump a tube in a bottle of water, mix, and you're ready to go
cons: Not as high a boost as a lot of competitors

customer_reviews.title: Whatever makes you drink the water!
customer_reviews.text: We were in a Sam’s club and tried this and instantly fell in love. The red drink has a great taste and just enough fizz to get you going but without the bad stuff. I work in a lab so we picked this stuff apart to figure out if it was safe or not. Bottom line it’s good, won’t hurt me and it gives me some extra vitamins all the better. I’ve since bought the purple one and it seems a little less fuzzy but taste really good as well
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Tastes really good.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes great and definitely gave me energy. I don’t drink coffee ( gross) or soda (carbonation burns my throat) so I’m not use to the affects of caffeine. I used this fruit punch flavor with natural b12 energy in my water one day at work and didn’t really notice it gave me energy until coworkers began commenting on how I had cleaned out and reorganized the whole storeroom! I didn’t feel weird, wired or jittery at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fyreflly

customer_reviews.title: pretty good but one big flaw
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great and works. Only problem I have is the sucralose. I wish they would use a natural sweetener like stevia so I could feel more comfortable drinking these more often. And also the "healthy" claim would be more accurate. Update: their customer service is incredible too!
customer_reviews.author: Qbrrt (Amber L)

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and your stomach.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the positive reviews. I usually drink about 3 energy drinks a day and wanted to find an alternative to switch to so I bought these. For one the taste is something to talk about. It is very sour and instantly burns your stomach. It’s like drinking liquid sweet tarts. It’s hard to stomach down an entire bottle of this without getting an upset stomach. As far as energy goes, I feel nothing from these. I tried to make the flavor work, but there’s no point as I had no results whatsoever from these drinks. a Super disappointment. Save your money and your stomachs.
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Don't Over Use It
customer_reviews.text: Just products work very well. But I must say using more then suggested is not a good idea it has caffeine in it. For me if I use it I just limited to two maybe one in the morning and one before I go walking if I'm tired. Plus I don't drink coffee if I'm going to use this B12 energy, to much Caffeine for me, and probably, taking three or more every day, would be too much caffeine in your system. That's just my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Greta Snowden

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a replacement for my Arbonne fix sticks bc my favorite flavor is a limited edition, they are dumb expensive, and the company has questionable practices imo. First I tried pure boost green apple-they were ok but still not in love with the flavor so I gave these a whirl. First off: the packaging is absolutely absurd and a clear F you to the environment. I mean REALLY full of plastic waste for no reason. Secondly: the flavor is horrible-I got the fruit punch and I generally love anything fruit punch flavored-this stuff is awful. It has a strong aftertaste and is just not good. I’ll be tossing the rest. 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is just right and just what I need great energy boost
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy this product I initially purchased it from Sam's Club as I am funny about purchasing food dri stock from different websites however this product is great it provides the energy needed to be fishing without that crashed that most products can give the flavor is great and has no issues I typically use 1 tube per bottle water, although the directions recommend to however it's your preference I would recommend this product to anyone else it gives a nice balance and even when I don't use it for a couple of weeks I don't get that caffeine headache or crash
customer_reviews.author: N!

customer_reviews.title: Super Sweet And Not Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Besides the packaging, generally these zip fizz are great energy boosting vitamin drinks. For my taste and preferences, this particular flavor loses a star because it is so sweet and not remotely refreshing; there’s no tartness that might help offset the sweetness. However, if you are a fan of HiC fruit punch, this drink is for you. Another star lost due the fact that these are poorly packaged in plastic tubes with a lot of extra outer packaging. I put it all in recycling but it would be great if they cut some of that back
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Like energy drinks without the gross taste and only$1.00
customer_reviews.text: You get your monster energy for less than $1.00 and it’s much healthier! Need I say more? This gives you energy! A lot of it! I don’t have to drink coffee all day. The only problem is you will want to buy more. This doesn’t taste bad like other energy drinks and it does have fizz. I’ll give you a helpful tip. When adding to bottled water drink at least a quarter of the bottle before you put it in. If you don’t it will overflow as soon as you pour it in. This is not like crystal light and the other powders you add to drinks for energy. This is actually wake you up and get things done energy.
customer_reviews.author: T. King

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, not too bad for an energy drink
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, not too bad for an energy drink. It's a little bit fizzy like soda hence the name zipfizz. It definitely gives me a boost for the second half of my day without jitters or heart palpitations and I also drink coffee in the morning. Also, if I were to drink coffee in the afternoon I would have a hard time sleeping that night but zipfizz does not disrupt my sleep. On the days I don't drink zipfizz I don't get as much done. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended on a teachers' Facebook Group I am a member of. The powder comes in small, plastic cylinders (plastic packaging is somewhat wasteful - would be better in packets) that you can easily pour into a water bottle. I only use half of the cylinder as the flavor is very strong, and I prefer a lighter taste. I drink one of these after lunch every day to get me through the afternoon. They provide an energy boost without jitters like caffeine. I have also purchased the blue raspberry flavor which is good also!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Zipfizz - THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Zipfizz is seriously the best drink and I had been using another electrolyte brand for my Keto and this is my new GO TO. It tastes better, I feel better. It prevents all those leg cramps that keto can cause and has all the vitamins for feeling good but also for looking good so if you are on keto or not and looking for an electrolyte drink, you should try this because it has all the B Vitamins too that the electrolyte drinks do not have. The fruit punch is AMAZING and the grape is also super tasty (and not as strong if you don't strong flavors)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H

customer_reviews.title: A great daily suppliment
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product by accident, a shipping mistake from Amazon and I love it. Most products like this usually have some negative side effect (jitters, taste,diminishing results and headaches) but zipfizz just does the job. Since the mistaken order I have ordered a new pack everyweek to keep a constant supply. It gives me energy for the day or workout and also works really well as immune support.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of Zipfizz! Wish they were cheaper or sold in bulk though
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE Zipfizz! Much more of a natural feeling energizer over other energy drinks. I usually have one every afternoon at work and about 29 minutes later, the afternoon drag is gone and I’m back at it. I’m a heavier caffeine user so one of these on the morning when I’m dead probably won’t do it. For the afternoon pickmeup, they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jared - Colorado Springs

customer_reviews.title: The bottom portion reminds me of chalky vitamins
customer_reviews.text: At first it vaguely tastes like tiki punch, but towards the end, no matter how often/well you shake the bottle, it tastes like powdery/chalky flintstone vitamins. I wasn't able to finish this flavor or the black cherry which was a free sample with my purchase, I passed the rest of the box to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best caffeine drink yet!
customer_reviews.text: As a caffeine junkie, I have tried countless products similar to Zipfizz. This is by far my favorite! In my opinion, it gives me more of an energy boost than coffee, Bang, Redbull, 5 Hour Energy, etc. Not to mention, it’s FAR cheaper than any of those above! It’s my caffeine drink of choice! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Ok first I am very picky about my drinks. Not a big water drinker. I have tried several kinds. This by far is the best amount of potassium and 0 sugar. Plus B12. I get dehydrated so easily game changer. But try with half of tube first. I did a full one but I like the strong taste. ZippFizz
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t love
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with zip fizz. I really didn’t like the flavor at all, so I passed it on to my brother who enjoyed it. I really didn’t feel like it gave me more energy or anything. The packaging is cute and easy to poor into a water bottle, but you definitely have to drink some of the water first if you are using a standard 16.9 fluid ounce disposable bottle. It will fizz over and make a mess if you don’t!
customer_reviews.author: Kales

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking 2 a day as a sugar alternative for over a year and here's the important stuff. Expect about 1 half filled tube for about every 40-50 random sample. It won't add carbonation, it fizzes a bit. 1 tube will go best in 32oz, 24oz if you want it to taste as strong as a monster/redbull. And probably more cardboard and plastic waste than I'm comfortable with. But it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: So Sour
customer_reviews.text: I got these on the rec of a friend, and they're pretty sour. I don't know how anyone could put a whole one in a water bottle and drink it. Also, i noticed no pick me up from it, and the packaging is very wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: chihuahuamom

customer_reviews.title: Energy Boosting a great pick me up
customer_reviews.text: These basically cost the same as other brands of energy drinks per, but maybe even a little cheaper. They give me so much energy and there is no crash. I love that they are 0 calorie and they have vitamins in there to help you vs other energy drinks that are just the worst! This is great if you want something sweet with an energy boost vs straight coffee. I really love these and I take them to work. As a nurse I need a lot of energy. And you can't go wrong with fruit punch flavor!!
customer_reviews.author: Makala Kuhr

customer_reviews.title: Taste amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be an Advocare Spark junkie, but I let my membership lapse and that’s find because I got really tired of paying high tax and shipping. I originally found these at Sam’s club and tried them to replace my spark. And I’m SO glad I did. They work equally as good if not better and I love the flavor (Fruit Punch)and these fizz to it!! It averages about $1 per serving. I’m on my second box and plan on trying other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Megan W.

customer_reviews.title: BEST WORKOUT DRINK
customer_reviews.text: I love zipfizz! I have one every day and the entire winter and flue season I didn’t get sick thank to the amazing amount of great vitamins! I bring 1 with me to the gym every day and this product does the job for sure! I love it and it has a great taste!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Barboza

customer_reviews.title: This is a Healthy Energy drink that tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the Zipfizz energy drink in different flavors. The fruit punch is my favorite so far. I showed it to my doctor when I had my physical a few months ago. My doctor surprisingly was okay with me drinking it. It doesn’t have sugar but does have B vitamins and lots of caffeine. I have seen this brand of energy drink at Costco also, but not the full box of Fruit punch flavor. I have purchased this many times and will continue since my primary care physician read the ingredients and said it was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Neysa

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful packaging
customer_reviews.text: These things are very effective, they’ll perk me up right away and work better than a Red Bull. My complaint is the absolutely absurd packaging. Hard plastic containers for each serving, wrapped in plastic, in a box 10x bigger than it needs to be. Extraordinarily wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Really picks you up!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking Zipfizz for years and was happy to find it on Amazon. Often I can only find it in multi-flavored options, and don't always like one of the flavors--so this was a great buy. Fruit punch is one of my favorites, and the price was great. Perfect in afternoon for me when I need a pick me up for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: All the energy no crash
customer_reviews.text: It's yummy, drink it in VERY cold water, mix, shake or stir it before each drink. If it sits out and gets warm it's like really nasty and tastes medicinal. But I love the energy it gives, encourages more water drinking for me, it's safe for diabetics to drink, never get any crash. Don't drink more than 2 in a day, I let my teens drink 1 instead of coffee or energy drinks and their Dr. Said it was safe for them.
customer_reviews.author: flo boon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money very
customer_reviews.text: My wife throws these in her launch every day for work and it I'm glad that I can find it cheaper so I can get a little more for her or some not spending so much for her to take to work
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Love Zipp-Fizz!
customer_reviews.text: Zip fizz is awesome for energy and alertness with almost zero caffeine (less than a cup of tea) No shaky feeling at ALL - just alert and focused. The fruit punch flavor is delicious. Personally I don’t care for the other flavors. I typically have one in the morning before I work out. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A must in my pantry
customer_reviews.text: These have helped me kick my addiction to Red Bull and they also make me feel great with the addition of vitamins. They taste amazing, and I buy them consistently, HOWEVER, zip fizz needs to hop on the environmental trend because their packaging is soo extra, especially since they recommend two a day.
customer_reviews.author: Laken Gross

customer_reviews.title: The perfect amount of fizz & NO sugar!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect amount of FIZZ! Beware though you need to drink enough water down to the paper line & then pour the powder in & keep the cap close by or it will come out the top. Screw the cap on fast & shake shake shake!! I drink usually 1 a day or 1 every other day. Keeps me from drinking soda, doesn't always give me a boost but I don't use it for working out I do get a little focused out of it when I am knee deep in work. Highly Highly recommend & I definitely buy it here vs getting it in Costco or Sams its literally double the price! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey H

customer_reviews.title: Better than cofee and more vitamins than taking them individually
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking this for the las 2 years and let me tell you, this is better than coffee for those coffee drinkers, this energy drink wakes me up without the downfall after hours, usually 1 would do the trink and 2 if I have a very busy day without a good sleep. If you drink it in the morning this sends you to the W/C. Love it
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Powder In Tubes
customer_reviews.text: I always buy zipfizz and absolutely love it. Infact I drink it twice daily EVERY day. However I knew something was wrong with my package this time. When I poured the zipfizz in a cup and compared it to another one from a box I bought at Sam's Club.... it was HALF the amount in the tube. My husband even notice this package barely had any powder in the tubes... the other box that came with it was fine. However , the other box had random amounts in the tubes. Not consistent. :/
customer_reviews.author: Lacey McLain

customer_reviews.title: tastes delicious,gives me the energy i need to make it through my day
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this to me and i am so happy she did! the flavor is amazing i put my water in the freezer let it get icy and hen it stays cold all day :) i have a busy life and i am always very tired this makes me feel energized and happy
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, and fruit punch is my #1! Tip- take a big swig of your water bottle before you add the powder or it will fizz out and make a big mess!
customer_reviews.author: The Eck

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these and seems a lot do cause inventory low. I don’t really like the packaging only because I think it’s wasteful in individual plastic tubes. Would prefer they were in recyclable packets. Little pricey too when we use 2 per day (me & hubby).
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Reddick

customer_reviews.title: Great “energy” alternative to coffee
customer_reviews.text: Originally tried a Sams club both and fell In love. Great “energy” drink from B12 and vitamin C. Replaced our daily coffee(s). Fruit punch is our favorite flavor. Take a small sip out of a bottle of water, pour in the Zipfizz, shake (after putting the lid on of course) and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: DTempleton

customer_reviews.title: Good & good for me!
customer_reviews.text: I truly have been using Zipp Fizz for 10 years.. I seem to never have an issue with things like B-vitamins! It provides lots of good stuff and is low/ no sugar for added benefit when looking to replace electrolytes. I love the punch flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully, tastes great
customer_reviews.text: it is basically a vitamin b complex drink. It comes as powder in a tube. You pour the powder into a 16 ounce water bottle. re cap the bottle and then shake. Make sure you are fast because the fizz in the name is no joke. It will bubble right up and out the top before you cap it if you aren't ready. It works wonderfully, tastes great. I cant find it where I live now, so I came to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Nearly instant energy!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several energy drinks in the past and find Zipfizz to work the best for me. Within 10 minutes of drinking a cup or glass of Zipfizz, I have the energy and alertness I'm looking for. I'm not a big fan of carbonation, and while Zipfizz has some, it is not as long lasting as soft drinks. I mix this with cold water in the summer and as a hot drink in the cooler weather. While this review is for "Fruit Punch" flavor, I've tried many flavors of Zipfizz. They are all good, but I have some favorites. Yours may be different.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product because of the ratings, but it was definitely a mistake. The flavor was definitely not good. However, I did drink one entire drink to see if it would get better. It did not. Also, about 30 mins later and I was extremely nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa E

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description.
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. Shows methyl B12, actually has cyano! And has sucralose, artificial sweetener! Threw it out, but was given full refund.
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: Life changing stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product has literally changed my life - I'm not a morning person and I'm sensitive to caffeine (it keeps me up all night even with just 1 cup in the morning). This tastes great and gives me a boost that lasts throughout the day without making me completely wired.
customer_reviews.author: Law

customer_reviews.title: Great for keto and fatigue and moods
customer_reviews.text: Live these. This product along with going keto has cured my chronic headache, and fatigue. My husband and I also noticed that our moods improved after taking these. I love at least 3 of the flavors. I get them on auto ship to save $$
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tasting (best of the flavors) energy drink without the bad stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Zippfizz is my favorite B12 energy drink on the market right now. The Punch flavor is the best tasting to me of the variety of flavors. This product (when cold) has a slight fizz to the drink that adds the extra kick to the flavor and texture of the drink that takes it over the top. I feel extremely energized after drinking this product. The only cons would be that when it is warm it has a bit of a vitamin flavor to it and it loses the fizz from the drink. Overall it is a great tasting, B12 infused drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to replace coffee, tea and energy drinks. also, healthier! We have tried all the flavors and enjoy the varieties! Been drinking these for over a year, helps to re-hydrate while working out!
customer_reviews.author: M ALICIA WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Try em and you’ll be hooked too
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, normally only could find them in big box membership chain. I like having them shipped in and saving time. The taste of these are good and they definitely give you a little pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. I don’t drink coffee so this is a great way to have energy, wake up and have focus in my day. Originally found it at Costco but the amazon subscription order is the way to go here. Buyer beware, if you are having bathroom problems it’ll Flush you out!
customer_reviews.author: Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Love this flavor
customer_reviews.text: The taste is wonderful but there's just too much waste. They could easily package these in biodegradable packagin. Perhaps so in one large tube so you don't use so many little pieces of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Mallette

customer_reviews.title: Same as what is sold in stores
customer_reviews.text: We buy the same product at Sam's Club for about the same price. It is exactly the same thing. My husband uses it for his workouts and likes the effect. Good product, good pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: These really work! I get to work around 0615 am and by 10 or 1030 I drink one of these to give me a boost. Not my favorite flavor though, I like the grape and cherry flavor better
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin B-12.  Need I say more?  Read on...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most effective B-12 delivery system there is short of an injection, along with other B vitamins, electrolytes, and a smorgasbord of other nutrients. I drink one every day and it makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hart

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love Zipfizz, Fruit Punch is my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Zipfizz, Fruit Punch is my favorite flavor. The flavor is sweet and tangy. This 10 calorie drink is chocked full of vitamins, the two that stand out to me is vitamin C and vitamin B12. Vitamin C helps you not get sick and vitamin B12 helps your food turn into energy. I drink at least one Zipfizz a day. It helps me stay away from soda because it has a yummy taste but also drink more water. Since you add it to water. Plus I have so much energy and its healthy energy. Not that jittery coffee energy, like a healthy constant energy.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin energy
customer_reviews.text: It's a good jump start for your body without lots of calories, sugar, starches or caffeine. I like it because I like other caffeinated beverages and can vary my intake separately. And, BTW, it's a great boost for the system after a late night out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love zipfizz! It is an essential part of my day. I love to take it pre work out for electrolyte balance and givin g me that extra push through my work out. It gives me 4 hours of clean energy and no crash at the end. Don't take it after 3-4 if you want to go to bed at a decent time. It also helps improve my slow digestion 😬 It is also a great price on here with subscribe and save- even better than Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Lisa White

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin booster
customer_reviews.text: For this kind of drink mix the flavor is pretty good. The cost is a little high though not exorbitant. Also, I buy this for the vitamin and health aspects, not energy. It does not give me any sort of energy boost that I've noticed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Zipfizz has replaced coffee for me.
customer_reviews.text: Zipfizz is life. Sure, it leaves a weird residue on things, but this can get me going in the morning or when I need a pick me up without the devastating coffee pewps. The variety of flavors in general are nice (Orange, Pink Lemonade, Grape, and Fruit Punch are my favorites). Also, simple to carry to work and add to a water bottle. Make sure to leave space for the "fizz"!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hadap

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have found that I really enjoy the ZipFizz concept, and like the Fruit punch. I have purchased this a couple times, and I will purchase it again. Like it!
customer_reviews.author: LeftLeo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is Vitamin B 12 deficient. The 1000mcg tablets didn't raise her levels enough. This supplement has huge quantities of Vitamin B 12 and has been a great way for her to add more to her diet. It tastes great and she feels better when she has one each morning (maybe due to the caffeine).
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Not a good replacement for Advocare spark
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see if it would be a good alternative to my Advocare Spark (I’ve drank it for years) and was disappointed. The flavor is ok but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Owens

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and wanted to try a new flavor. I was hoping it would be like a Hawaiian punch taste but it's a lot stronger than that. I ended up diluting more so than other flavors. I like to drink them in afternoon before I go to gym. Gives me a nice pick me up to actually make myself go. I give these mixes a 5 but this particular flavor a 4. My favorites so far are still the iced tea and pink lemonade.
customer_reviews.author: ANC

customer_reviews.title: Convenient packaging, great taste
customer_reviews.text: My college son loves these! The ease of throwing the individual single serve canisters in his backpack and then pouring in a water bottle to cure the mid day slump is super convenient and healthier/cheaper than buying a coffee he’d load with cream and sugar. Great taste also.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had bio-degradable tubes and less plastic. Too much waste with the packaging. The flavor is good though and they provide a nice boost.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I put one tube in 48+ oz of water & it's perfect. Otherwise, it's too sweet for me. The fruit punch flavor is awesome & it helps me drink more water. The tubes are easy to use & easy to take with you. I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor - Packaging Waste
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor. I like the product. I don't like the packaging. All those individual plastic vials. They function great. But, I feel bad about them going to the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Energy
customer_reviews.text: Good drink, easy to make and taste great. I found it helped my fatigue and sluggish symptoms. I now have more energy and no longer tired.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Case of our favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and glad we can get one case with just this flavor. Good vitamins and keeps you going during the day. Great value especially if you use Amazon Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Doesn't ship well on the autoship marketplace
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but when I put them on autoship, it came in June said it would be late and then that went away and it just got bumped to July. I didn't have a problem with the rest of the order. Just beware of this. Same thing happened with 2 flavors. (fruit punch and pink lemonade)
customer_reviews.author: brent bockbrader

customer_reviews.title: Delicious boost, guilty plastic consumption.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish these did come in those hard plastic tubes. Maybe has to do with that delightful fizz? I have environmental guilt - hence low star on packaging. Otherwise yummy, iced afternoon boost without feeling ‘jacked’ like energy drinks.
customer_reviews.author: JQGarn

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: Love this fruit punch flavor. It is sweeter than others I’ve tried (like the black cherry) but does not taste so vitamin-y/bitter like some (pink lemonade).
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy alternative to energy drinks. Almost like a silent burst of energy with no crashes or side effects. Drink one on way work daily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: can dilute more
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good, but pricey. So I was glad to find that one tube can flavor a whole quart of water. I'm mainly interested in keeping hydrated and the flavor is enough to make me drink more. I keep the bottle near me during the day, which helps too, in drinking more. And I like the fruit punch flavor.
customer_reviews.author: moderatelymoderate

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The ad for this product is way over stated. It tastes great, helps with consuming more water during the day but it does NOT give you more energy. At least not for me. I didn't see any difference after using it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fodor

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and energy
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor and Amazon is the only place to get just the fruit punch flavor. It does add energy for a non coffee drinker in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking dor
customer_reviews.text: I’m picky about flavors. Most places only offer a mixed flavor pack in a large size. I’m glad I was able to find this all in 1 flavor.
customer_reviews.author: J New

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tasting flavor with lits of potassium for those on keto, who find it difficult to get enough in their diet
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: great value and delicious
customer_reviews.text: flavor is awesome. The b12 gives u energy for sure, comes in a big box with like 20 in it and a free sample of another flavor to try... definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Wilfawn

customer_reviews.title: No crashing
customer_reviews.text: I love ZipFizz... this flavor is delicious. I just wish it were in a more eco friendly pack, the plastic tubes are such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: T. Felix

customer_reviews.title: Energy
customer_reviews.text: I think it taste like fruit punch and it is good. I love the packaging and as long as you get it at the right time it's the right price
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Scheible

customer_reviews.title: Intense effect on nervousness and heartrate.
customer_reviews.text: (Donna-wife) It tastes great and yes, it "picks you up," but make no mistake, while it's a good source of potassium for folks on low-carb diets, it is NOT a health drink. It has a bit more caffeine than a regular cup of coffee, but the Guarana from "green tea" can have unpleasant effects. I can usually down 3-4 regular coffees a day and only experience occasional tremors, etc. I just spent the night with palpitations, tremors, headache, night sweats after drinking one of these/day for 3 days--the withdrawal is intense. If you have tachycardia conditions or anxiety issues, I don't recommend this unless you're a 16-year-old healthy late-night computer gamer.
customer_reviews.author: HKeen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good flavor. They are so turns a little strong so I’m able to add more water and they still have great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite energy drink
customer_reviews.text: Had a sample of another flavor. Simply my favorite energy drink. Mix with other flavors for unique taste.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Fan Forever

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite pick me up! If you use spark switch this is way more cost effective and just as good!
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I usually drink the zipfrizz during my workouts for an add boost. I also like that it has a lot of vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Chelli

customer_reviews.title: Great taste I do 16 fl ozs not 20
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. It kind of gives me energy but I really use it for the vitamins and as a healthier alternative to soda.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Energy without jitters or crash.  Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I love zipfizz! This gives me energy to keep up with my 3 boys but not feel Jittery or a crash! Has great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Fruit punch is my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: My teen girls and I love fruit punch Zipfizz. Thankful for an easy to pack energy drink that doesn’t cause jitters or a crash.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Beschinski

customer_reviews.title: BEST! BEST! BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I think I found the fountain of youth and energy with these! I drink in the am and the general overall good feeling lasts all day! Energy and mental clarity in a tube!! Taste good, you get a vitaminy taste in the last sip, like a Flintstone's vitamin so not bad. I love these!!! If your in KETO I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia G.

customer_reviews.title: Zip - Wow
customer_reviews.text: I recently tried this at Costco, I had to have it! I appreciate being able to purchase just the flavor I liked best. Pricing is also reasonable. Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for energy
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a replacement for Advocare Spark. This is very comparable in terms of taste and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Elledge

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the flavor! Not near as good as other energy/vitamin drinks I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for those unhealthy energy drinks
customer_reviews.text: Helps give you a boost in energy when you need to get things done. Helped me keep going when I was working on clearing an incredibly thick area of rotting wood and small trees. Helps my husband to get up and at em early in the morning. Also works out cheaper for me to order 2 instead of drive to the store with the few shipping etc. Definitely will keep ordering this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So delicious and a healthy energy boost!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on keto diet and don’t drink coffee so this is my daily lunch boost. Fruit lunch is a favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: BSR

customer_reviews.title: Energy without Jitters!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I feel energized but not jittery or shaky like I would if I drank too much coffee. I’ll definitely continue buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for electrolyte sub
customer_reviews.text: Not to mich of a fan of the bubbles and grit feeling. Does the job. Helps with leg cramps too
customer_reviews.author: martin maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great energy drink without jitters
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They taste great and give me the needed boost to get myself to the gym!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Might need to order 2 boxes
customer_reviews.text: I assumed it was a 30 pack of tubes not 20 and I did not want a grapefruit in the mix at all; this in that regard very dissatisfied. I must admit though that the taste of the fruit punch is amazing in flavor and the best by far of the zipfizz.!!
customer_reviews.author: don curry

customer_reviews.title: Zippfizz! Ahhhhhh!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah!!!! Zipfizz, where have you been all my life? I love fizzy drinks and the taste is great. It really helps me drink water through out the day without getting bored with plain old water taste. Plus, the awesome packaging let's you take these on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Shyne

customer_reviews.title: Does give us a boost
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product, it does what it claims. Very fast delivery will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Olga Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Really yummy! Like the energy it gives me without being over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Allie K.

product_meta.title: Zipfizz Healthy Energy Drink Mix, Hydration with B12 and Multi Vitamins, Fruit Punch, 20 Count
product_meta.description:
Zipfizz is a great tasting, HEALTHY energy drink-mix that delivers a powerful charge of micronutrients to the body's fuel system. Zipfizz has packed a convenient rush of vitamins, minerals, electrolytes, and key amino acids that protect the immune system and provide enhanced hydration all in a single tube. Perfect for athletes, busy families, students, executives, and people on the go. Zipfizz's advanced formula delivers an immediate, revitalizing burst of energy and focus.

Use Zipfizz as a morning or afternoon pick-me-up, or enhance your training by taking it before, during, or after a hard workout.

Because Zipfizz contains no sugar, users can experience increased energy for up to 4 - 6 hours without the sudden sugar "crash" associated with other energy drinks.
feature_bullets: Loaded with Vitamins, Antioxidants, and Electrolytes
Low Carb and ZERO Sugar with 4-6 hours of Energy
Gluten Free. Contains 100 mg of caffeine from natural sources. Limit 3 tubes per day

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
